bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with shan na 閃肭. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry gu sui bu 骨碎補：蜀人治閃折 筋骨傷損，取根搗篩，煮黃米粥，和之裹傷處，良 , “When the people of Shu/Sichuan treat a sprain with injured sinews and bones, they take the root and pound it through a sieve. Then they boil a yellow rice congee and mix the two components to wrap the injured location. This is excellent”.
